attributes.action: pass legislation permitting involuntary permanent sterilisation for child abusers, such as the 3 involved in the murder of Baby P.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The only way to safeguard children, and our community, from individuals with a proven history of child abuse and cruelty is through a managed sterilisation programme that makes it impossible for them to conceive again. Rehabilitation doesn't work. We are not doing enough to prevent ghastly acts of violence and even torture on our children.
